item.description:
TRIVIA at the Sambar - great conversation with new/old friends, food, drinks, and Steve's Birthday!!

Join us for a fun night!

This is laid back Trivia - if you know one answer - great - if not support those that do...we have had some very interesting topics..and it is always a fun night.


Our members love Trivia and we have been working with local restaurants to sponsor an early Trivia for Fall/Winter. We worked a schedule out with Sambar - a cozy restaurant in Newport with great food and drinks...

Thursday night is a great night for fun out in Newport and it won't interfere with Monday night football ...

Please sign up and/or send me a message if you are interested in Thursday Night Trivia.

I arrive between 8- 8:15PM and we have been pretty good about an 8:30PM start time.
It normally lasts between 1 1/2 - 2 hours.

Great prizes for every round !!

Parking - Until beginning of November you have to follow what the signs say for parking in Newport. The last event our members found easy parking in the Ocean Breeze Cafe lot - less than two blocks after Sambar on the left.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Lonnie or ask for Newport Friends Meetup Group and if you cannot find us - please call: 829-8516
item.name: Early Trivia Sambar & Trivia Wiz Steve's Birthday : )...
